mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM free_board WHERE bo_del_yn = 'N'

SELECT a.bo_num , a.bo_title , a.bo_content , a.bo_category , b.comm_nm as bo_category_nm , a.bo_mem_id , a.bo_hit , substr(a.bo_reg_date,1,10) as bo_reg_date , a.bo_notice FROM free_board a left join comm_code b ON (a.bo_category = b.comm_cd) WHERE a.bo_del_yn = 'N'
ORDER BY bo_notice,bo_num DESC

SELECT a.bo_num , a.bo_title , a.bo_category , b.comm_nm AS bo_category_nm , a.bo_mem_id , a.bo_content , a.bo_hit , a.bo_reg_date , a.bo_mod_date , a.bo_del_yn , a.bo_notice FROM free_board a left join comm_code b ON (a.bo_category = b.comm_cd) WHERE a.bo_del_yn = 'N' AND a.bo_num = #{boNum} AND a.bo_notice = #{boNotice} ORDER BY a.bo_num DESC
